last_episode_to_air.name: Jodi Makes a Boat with Max
last_episode_to_air.overview: Jodi and Nana see Teacher Harriet and Max playing with a homemade boat. Jodi uses things she finds in nature to make one, too.

name: Daniel Tiger's Neighborhood
overview: The life of 4-year-old Daniel Tiger and his friends as they learn fun and practical strategies and skills necessary for growing and learning.

episodes.name: Daniel's Birthday
episodes.overview: Today is Daniel Tiger’s birthday! Daniel is very excited to go to Baker Aker’s bakery to help his Mom pick out a cake for his party, and so proud that his mom lets him carry the cake himself. But when they arrive back home after a bumpy ride on Trolley, he discovers that his birthday cake is smooshed! What a disappointment. His father helps him see that there are good things even in a smooshed cake – it’s yummy.

episodes.name: Daniel's Picnic
episodes.overview: Daniel Tiger and his friends Prince Wednesday and Miss Elaina are having a picnic at the park near the clock factory. When it starts to rain, their picnic is ruined, leaving them very disappointed. Dad Tiger helps them turn their disappointment around with an inside picnic instead – inside the clock factory where the friends find something else good when they get to hear “chime time” together.

episodes.name: Daniel Visits School
episodes.overview: Daniel is visiting school for the first time and is a little nervous because he doesn’t know what it will be like there. He packs his backpack with his favorite playthings from home – a lot of things! Teacher Harriet shows him around his classroom, and Daniel is surprised to find so many familiar things there. He learns that asking questions is one way to learn about something that’s new – and to feel more comfortable there.

episodes.name: Daniel Visits the Doctor
episodes.overview: Daniel goes to the doctor for his regular check up. Before his visit, he’s feeling a little uneasy – about one stripe scared, even if he knows he will not need to get a shot. Daniel and Mom Tiger talk, draw and play about some of the things that Dr. Anna will use – a stethoscope, an otoscope, a scale and more. With Tigey and his homemade doctor book in hand, Daniel learns that it also helps to talk with Dr. Anna about what will happen.

episodes.name: Daniel's Babysitter
episodes.overview: Mom and Dad Tiger are going out for the evening, and Prince Tuesday comes to be Daniel’s babysitter. As Daniel gets ready for bed, he misses his Mom and Dad. But Prince Tuesday reminds him that his parents will be back soon. When Tigey goes missing right before bedtime, Daniel learns what a grr-ific babysitter Prince Tuesday is. And his trust continues to build when he sees that his parents do come back, just as they promised.

episodes.name: Daniel Goes to School
episodes.overview: Daniel joins his friends Prince Wednesday, Katerina Kittycat, O the Owl and Miss Elaina at school, but doesn’t want his Dad to leave, until Dad Tiger reminds him that ‘grownups come back.’ Miss Elaina is missing her mom and has lost her special locket with her mom’s picture in it. The children help Miss Elaina find her locket. Before long the school day is over and, just as promised, the grownups come back to take their children home.

episodes.name: Daniel Gets Mad
episodes.overview: Daniel Tiger and his friend Prince Wednesday are very excited to play at the beach today. But then it rains, and Mom Tiger says they cannot play outside, making them very mad. Mom Tiger helps the boys with their mad feelings and find ways to calm down and think. They take a deep breath, count to 4, and that helps them make a grr-ific new plan — to make an inside beach instead!

episodes.name: Katerina Gets Mad
episodes.overview: Daniel and his friends are excited to be able to try the new instruments at Music Man Stan’s Music Shop. But Katerina Kittycat really wants to play the triangle. She gets very,very mad when someone else picks the instrument she wants to play. Music Man Stan helps Katerina find ways to deal with her mad feelings – like taking a deep breath, counting to 4 – and then dancing and stomping and singing.

episodes.name: Prince Wednesday Finds a Way to Play
episodes.overview: Friends Daniel and Katerina Kittycat are playing “house” today at school. Prince Wednesday wants to play too, but he wants to be a loud dinosaur. Katerina tells him that loud dinosaurs are not allowed! He’ll wake the baby! The friends work on finding a way to play together, and Prince Wednesday joins in by pretending to be a quiet, friendly dinosaur.

episodes.name: Finding a Way to Play on Backwards Day
episodes.overview: Friends Daniel and O the Owl are at Miss Elaina’s house in the Museum-Go-Round today. She’s very excited because she has planned a special “backwards day.” But O isn’t excited about this backward play – in fact he’s quite uncomfortable about so many backward things. With the help of Miss Elaina’s father, Music Man Stan, the friends find a way to play together.

episodes.name: Daniel and Miss Elaina Play Rocketship
episodes.overview: Daniel has come to play with Miss Elaina today! They decide to play “outer space,” but Miss Elaina gets upset when her cardboard telescope and spaceship accidentally break. Her mother, Lady Elaine, helps the friends see that they can still have fun together, even without the toys – just because they’re friends! They use their imaginations to keep playing, which is just as much fun!

episodes.name: Daniel Plays at the Castle
episodes.overview: Daniel is visiting Prince Wednesday at the Castle and Daniel is excited about all the things Prince Wednesday has in his room – especially his rock collection. But the rocks aren’t for playing – they’re just for looking. Daniel and Prince Wednesday learn that friendship is about more than just playing with each other’s toys – it’s about being together!

episodes.name: Friends Help Each Other
episodes.overview: Daniel is visiting his friend Katerina Kittycat who has planned a special tea party. When Katerina accidentally knocks the tea set on the floor, she is sad and upset. But she learns that there are lots of ways that friends help each other, and putting everything back is just one of those ways.

episodes.name: Daniel Helps O Tell a Story
episodes.overview: Daniel is visiting at O the Owl’s house and Daniel is excited to see how many books O has.  The boys choose a special book to read – a book about dinosaurs. But they discover that the last page of the story is missing!  O gets very flustered, but his friend Daniel helps him use his imagination, and together they have lots of pretend fun making up their own end to the story.

episodes.name: Something Special for Dad
episodes.overview: When Dad receives a letter from Grandpere, Daniel sees how happy Dad is.  Daniel really loves Dad, so he decides to send him a letter too.  Then he goes to the Post Office with Mom, where he learns how letters are sorted and mailed.  He even joins Mr. McFeely on his “speedy delivery” to give Dad his very special letter!

episodes.name: I Love You, Mom
episodes.overview: Daniel wants to surprise Mom Tiger with her favorite banana bread because he knows how much she likes it – and “making something is one way to say I love you.”  He and Dad go to Baker Aker’s Bakery, where they learn about the bread-making process.  They return home to surprise Mom and she happily shares the banana bread gift with them too!

episodes.name: A Trip to the Enchanted Garden
episodes.overview: The Tiger family is making strawberry pancakes for breakfast this morning, but they are out of strawberries.  Mom, Dad and Daniel all head to the Enchanted Garden so they can pick their own strawberries.  Daniel is very curious, and learns that if he looks closely, he may be able to learn something new as he answers his own questions about how strawberries grow.

episodes.name: A Trip to the Crayon Factory
episodes.overview: Daniel Tiger, Miss Elaina, and Katerina Kittycat take a trip to the factory to see how people make crayons. Their friend O the Owl has to stay home because he’s not feeling well.  At the factory, the children watch the crayons being made.  Daniel looks and listens closely because that’s one way to learn.  Daniel has an idea to take pictures at the factory and give them to O at the end of the day, so that O can learn about crayons too!

episodes.name: Daniel Shares His Tigertastic Car
episodes.overview: Daniel and his friends are playing together in the park.  Daniel has a new toy car and isn’t ready to share it with the others.  But with his Dad’s help, Daniel learns that sharing means someone else gets to take a turn, and then he’ll get it back.

episodes.name: Katerina Shares her Tutu
episodes.overview: Daniel is playing at Katerina’s house and the friends decide to perform a Jungle Dance show.  Daniel wants to be a lion, and Katerina wants to be a dancing flower, but they both need the same tutu for their costume.  With Henrietta’s help they find a way to share the tutu and perform a grr-ific Jungle Dance show!

episodes.name: Prince Wednesday Goes to the Potty
episodes.overview: Prince Wednesday is in the block corner at school building the “tallest tower in the world!”  Even though he needs to go to the bathroom, he doesn’t want to stop what he is doing.  Teacher Harriet helps him learn how important it is to stop and go right away.

episodes.name: Daniel Goes to the Potty
episodes.overview: Dad Tiger’s trumpet is broken, so he takes Daniel along to Music Man Stan’s Shop to get it fixed. While at the shop, Daniel needs to go to the bathroom, but thinks he will have to wait until they get home.  Music Man Stan explains that everyone goes to the bathroom, and Daniel learns that he can use the bathroom there – or anywhere else in the neighborhood.

episodes.name: Fruit Picking Day
episodes.overview: Daniel and his friends are enjoying a Fruit Festival in the Enchanted Garden. Prince Wednesday is upset because his big brother Prince Tuesday can pick the highest fruit off the tree branches, but he can’t. He wishes he wasn’t so little! Then, when the festival-goers spot a very special magical golden pear on the ground, Prince Wednesday is the only one little enough to reach it.

episodes.name: Daniel Is Big Enough to Help Dad
episodes.overview: Dad Tiger is building a playhouse, and Daniel wants to help. Daniel is frustrated that he is not big enough to use the grown up tools. Dad Tiger shows Daniel that there are things he can do to help that he’s just the right size for.

episodes.name: Daniel Waits for Show and Tell
episodes.overview: Daniel is so excited to share a book he made with his class at “show and tell,” but he’s finding it very difficult to wait. He finds that doing something, like singing on Trolley, playing during science time and imagining make the waiting much easier!

episodes.name: A Night Out at the Restaurant
episodes.overview: Daniel and his family are going out to dinner, and Katerina is coming too. Daniel and Katerina have a hard time waiting at the restaurant, but soon learn ways to make the waiting time easier…and even fun!

episodes.name: Thank You, Grandpere Tiger!
episodes.overview: Grandpere Tiger comes to visit, but Daniel is sad that Grandpere can’t stay for the special “Thank You Day” celebration later that day. Daniel learns to be thankful for the time they DO have together, and is then surprised when Grandpere appears at the celebration after all!

episodes.name: Neighborhood Thank You Day
episodes.overview: It’s Thank You Day in the Neighborhood– a special celebration when each of the neighbors puts a note in the “Thank You Tree” as a way to say thank you to one another. Daniel has trouble deciding who of his neighbors he wants to thank with his note. The episode ends with a Thank You Day feast with all the neighbors celebrating together.

episodes.name: The Neighborhood Votes
episodes.overview: The Tiger family is going to Clock Factory Park today to hear a big announcement from King Friday. Daniel has to make several choices throughout the day, culminating in one BIG group decision: King Friday announces that the children can choose one new piece of playground equipment by voting for the one they want.

episodes.name: The Class Votes
episodes.overview: At school Daniel and his classmates get to choose their new class pet. Teacher Harriet explains that they can either get a bunny or a turtle. The children learn what it means to ‘vote’ and that sometimes it doesn’t always turn out your way.  Each of the children find something to love about their new pet, ‘Snowball’!

episodes.name: Be a Vegetable Taster!
episodes.overview: Teacher Harriet introduces Daniel and his friends to the school’s vegetable garden and asks them to help her pick out some healthy vegetables for their snack. They explore the garden, picking and trying different vegetables…but not everyone is eager to taste the new foods.

episodes.name: Daniel Tries a New Food
episodes.overview: Miss Elaina is having dinner with the Tiger family and she encourages Daniel to try some new food: Vegetable Spaghetti and Banana Swirl. Daniel is convinced he won’t like Veggie Spaghetti, even though he’s never tried it before. Miss Elaina encourages him to be adventurous and try the new food. She does the same herself, and even though she doesn’t like all of it, she’s proud of herself for trying.

episodes.name: Good Morning Daniel
episodes.overview: It’s a typical morning in the Tiger household, and Daniel has to get up and get ready for school, but his playing and imagining distract him from his routine. Daniel learns that his morning routine helps him be ready in time for Trolley to take him to school.

episodes.name: Goodnight Daniel
episodes.overview: Tonight, Daniel is pretending to be Super Daniel! But after dinner, he has to follow his nighttime routine even though he would rather play. Young viewers follow Daniel as he gets ready for bed and learns that even superheroes get sleepy and go to bed, too.

episodes.name: Daniel Gets a Shot
episodes.overview: Daniel has an appointment at the doctor today and he has to get a shot. He is very apprehensive and does not want to go. So Daniel asks Mom Tiger questions about the shot, and she shares her trick for staying brave in scary situations. And Daniel finds that the shot was not so bad after all!

episodes.name: A Stormy Day
episodes.overview: Daniel and O the Owl are having fun playing outside in the rain until a thunderstorm builds up and worries them. When Mom Tiger teaches them to think of something happy, O and Daniel learn that the thunderstorm is not so scary after all!

episodes.name: Daniel Plays Ball
episodes.overview: Daniel, Miss Elaina and Prince Wednesday are at the park with Prince Tuesday. They decide to play a game with a ball. Daniel struggles to catch the ball and gets very frustrated. All of his friends remind him that if he keeps on trying, he’ll get better.

episodes.name: O Builds a Tower
episodes.overview: In the block corner at school, O the Owl is determined to use all of the blocks to build the tallest tower in the world. When the blocks keep falling O feels ready to give up, but Teacher Harriet and his friends encourage him to keep trying.

episodes.name: Daniel's Sleepover
episodes.overview: Daniel goes to his friend Prince Wednesday’s for a sleepover. They brush and wash and get ready for bed, but as they get ready to go to sleep they notice some things that could be just a little bit scary.  Once they investigate further, they learn the things they are seeing actually aren’t scary at all!

episodes.name: Backyard Camping
episodes.overview: Daniel and O the Owl are camping in the backyard with Dad Tiger. This is O’s first time sleeping in a tent and he is feeling a little unsure.  Once he examines this new setting closely, he learns that it’s not so scary! In fact, different can be fun!

episodes.name: You Are Special
episodes.overview: The children are putting on a show at school today, each doing something that makes them special. O the Owl wants to be just like the others but, with a little encouragement, he learns that there are things that make him special, too.

episodes.name: Daniel Is Special
episodes.overview: Daniel and Dad take a walk through the neighborhood, admiring the colors of the leaves. On their way, they meet Miss Elaina and O the Owl who each do special things that make Daniel wonder if he is as special as they are.  Dad reminds Daniel of the things that make him special, like his whimsical imagination!

episodes.name: The Dragon Dance
episodes.overview: In school the children are all helping Teacher Harriet with a big art project: creating a dancing dragon! Everyone is eager to finish so the dragon can dance, but they learn that they need to work together so the big project can be finished.

episodes.name: Teacher Harriet's Birthday
episodes.overview: It is Teacher Harriet’s birthday and the children want to surprise her.  Mom Tiger helps them decorate the classroom with streamers and the children learn that they need to work together to make a special birthday present surprise.

episodes.name: Clean Up Time
episodes.overview: Daniel and O the Owl are playing “farm” at Daniel’s house. They are having a lot of fun, but are making quite a mess! After losing his watch in a messy room, Daniel realizes that cleaning up and putting his toys away will help him find it.

episodes.name: Neighborhood Clean Up
episodes.overview: A wind storm has made a mess of the Neighborhood playground and no one can play.  When King Friday proclaims that it is Clean Up Day, everyone helps by throwing away  and recycling the trash. The children learn that they can all work together.

episodes.name: Play Pretend
episodes.overview: Daniel's teacher has her students use their imaginations while playing with a cardboard box, but O the Owl has some trouble; while pretending to be superhero with Grandpere, Daniel notices his dad forgot his lunch and decides to bring it to him.

episodes.name: Super Daniel!
episodes.overview: Daniel and Grandpere are at home pretending to be superheroes when Daniel notices that Dad has forgotten to take his lunch to work with him.  He and Grandpere take Dad’s lunchbox to the Clock Factory and Daniel uses his imagination to have super adventures along the way.

episodes.name: Daniel Uses His Words
episodes.overview: Daniel is having lots of fun playing “farm”, until, as Mom Tiger is cleaning up, she accidentally ruins Daniel’s game. Grrr! Mom helps Daniel use his words to tell her how he is feeling so she can understand why he is upset.

episodes.name: All Aboard!
episodes.overview: Daniel and his friends are playing “train” at school, but things aren’t going Katerina’s way. Meow! Katerina learns that others will not be able to help her if they don’t understand why she is upset.  She finds a way to use her words and her friends find ways to help so that they can all play together!

episodes.name: The Royal Sandbox
episodes.overview: Daniel and Prince Wednesday are making sand pies in the sandbox. They decide to top off a sand pie with Prince Tuesday's royal crown, but they soon see that this wasn’t such a good idea. They learn how to apologize to Prince Tuesday and make the situation better – by helping clean the crown and promising to ask first next time.

episodes.name: Daniel Says I'm Sorry
episodes.overview: Daniel, Katerina and Miss Elaina are playing cars at school, until Miss Elaina accidentally upsets Daniel. Teacher Harriet helps the children learn how to apologize to a friend. Later, when Daniel accidentally upsets Katerina, he knows just what he needs to do.

episodes.name: It's Time to Go
episodes.overview: Daniel, O the Owl and Katerina are playing “library” at the Treehouse. When it’s time for them to go home, Katerina and Daniel don’t want to stop playing because they are having so much fun! They learn that choosing one more thing to do before they leave makes their transition a little easier.

episodes.name: Daniel Doesn't Want to Stop Playing
episodes.overview: Daniel is playing “Trolley” with Mom and Dad in the living room. When Mom tells him that it’s time to work on his school project, Daniel doesn’t want to stop playing. Mom helps Daniel by allowing him to pick one more thing to do with his toy Trolley. After Daniel makes one last stop, he’s ready to work on his school project.

episodes.name: Safety Patrol
episodes.overview: Today at school, the kids are playing with traffic signs. Prince Tuesday comes for a special visit, wearing his crossing guard uniform. He takes the class on a walk through the neighborhood, and they practice their safety rules along the way!

episodes.name: Safety at the Beach
episodes.overview: It’s a beautiful day in the neighborhood, so Mom Tiger takes Daniel and Katerina to Jungle Beach to play. The children get a bit carried away during their treasure hunting play and drift a bit too far away from Mom Tiger. She reminds them that to stay safe near the water, they need to stop and listen!

episodes.name: Neighbor Day
episodes.overview: In this half hour special Daniel learns how good it feels to be neighborly and that one kind act can lead to many. His first good deed starts a chain reaction of kindness all around the Neighborhood, culminating with the declaration of "Neighbor Day"!

episodes.name: Calm at the Clock Factory
episodes.overview: Daniel and his friends are visiting Dad Tiger’s Clock Factory. Daniel’s excitement to show off his dad and the tigertastic clocks is making him a bit silly. He learns that there are places to be calm and places where it’s OK to be silly!

episodes.name: Calm Before Story Time
episodes.overview: The kids are going to the Neighborhood Library for story time! All the excitement has made them feel a bit silly. Prince Wednesday has a hard time getting calm for the library, but learns that there are places to be calm and places where it’s more than OK to be silly!

episodes.name: Daniel's New Friend
episodes.overview: Daniel and Miss Elaina are at Prince Wednesday’s castle for a royal play date, and meet his cousin Chrissie. As they play “knights,” they discover that, although Chrissie needs some help walking, they are the same in many ways.

episodes.name: Same and Different
episodes.overview: While Daniel is playing dress up with his friends at school, he feels different when he realizes that not everyone has a tail like him. He learns that everyone has differences, but that these are the things that make us unique.

episodes.name: Katerina's Costume
episodes.overview: Daniel and Katerina are at Miss Elaina’s Museum-Go-Round to make their costumes for Dress Up Day. While Daniel and Miss Elaina know exactly what they want to be, Katerina is having a harder time deciding on just the right costume. Eventually she comes up with a very clever idea!

episodes.name: Dress Up Day
episodes.overview: It’s Dress Up Day in the Neighborhood of Make-Believe and it’s time for the annual main street parade! The children visit all the stores, showing off their fancy costumes and receiving different stickers from their neighbors.

episodes.name: Snowflake Day!
episodes.overview: In this thirty minute holiday musical episode, the Neighborhood is celebrating Snowflake Day!

episodes.name: A Snowy Day
episodes.overview: It’s a snowy day in the Neighborhood, and Miss Elaina is coming over to play! Mom Tiger helps Daniel change out of his pajamas into clothes that will keep him warm. When it’s time to go outside, Daniel learns how important it is to choose the appropriate clothes.

episodes.name: Tutu All the Time
episodes.overview: Katerina is wearing her favorite sparkly tutu at school today! She likes to wear it all the time, even when she’s painting and playing “grizzly bear” with her friends. But she soon learns how important it is to choose the appropriate clothes for the things you want to do.

episodes.name: Daniel Gets a Cold
episodes.overview: It’s Prince Wednesday’s birthday party at school today! But Daniel is not feeling very well. He really does not want to miss the party, but learns that when you’re sick, rest is best.

episodes.name: Mom Tiger Is Sick
episodes.overview: It’s a busy day at Jungle Beach, and every one is working on something. Mom Tiger is finishing up invitations for Fruit Picking Day, when she starts sneezing. She’s not feeling very well. Luckily, Dad and Daniel help with the invitations so Mom Tiger can get some much needed rest!

episodes.name: Duckling Goes Home
episodes.overview: Today at school, the kids learn that Ducky has grown too big for their classroom, and it’s time to take him back to the farm. Daniel and Miss Elaina are quite upset about the news. The children cope with their sadness in different ways, and they feel better –little by little.

episodes.name: Daniel Feels Left Out
episodes.overview: On their way home from the neighborhood grocery store, Dad and Daniel stop by the tree house. O the Owl and Katerina Kittycat have been playing together all day, and are even having dinner together! Daniel feels left out. Mom and Dad Tiger help Daniel cope with his sad feelings, and he feels better-little by little.

episodes.name: Daniel Gets Frustrated
episodes.overview: Daniel is playing at home with Mom Tiger today, but nothing seems to be going his way. He can’t do what he wants to do, and this makes him feel frustrated! With help from Mom Tiger, Daniel learns how to manage his frustration, and thinks of new ways to play.

episodes.name: Frustration at School
episodes.overview: Daniel and his friends are playing ‘restaurant’ at school today. Daniel feels frustrated when he can’t find what he is looking for. Luckily, he learns to cope with his frustration by taking a step back and asking for help and soon dinner is served!

episodes.name: Daniel Is Jealous
episodes.overview: Daniel and Katerina are playing “airplane” with Grandpere. Daniel thinks Katerina is getting too much attention from Grandpere and starts to feel jealous. Daniel explains his feelings and is reassured that he is Grandpere’s one and only Daniel.

episodes.name: Jealousy at the Treehouse
episodes.overview: Daniel and Katerina are at O the Owl’s house today, playing with his new science kit. Daniel and Katerina feel jealous of O because they want science tools just like his. After talking about their feelings, the children realize how they can all enjoy O’s special science kit.

episodes.name: Someone Else's Feelings
episodes.overview: Using their play toolkits, Daniel and O the Owl are pretending to make “repairs” to Daniel’s playhouse. Daniel is having lots of fun hammering loudly, but it’s upsetting O, who would rather do something quieter. Daniel loves hammering so much that it’s hard for him to see why it upsets O. Mom helps Daniel think about how O is feeling. He comes to realize that they can both have fun as quiet handymen!

episodes.name: Empathy at School
episodes.overview: Chrissie and Daniel are playing “doctor” at school today, but when Chrissie loses her special bracelet, she doesn’t feel like playing anymore. Daniel has trouble understanding why. Teacher Harriet helps him understand how Chrissie may be feeling. Daniel remembers how worried he was when he thought Tiger was lost, and decides to stop playing and help find the bracelet.

episodes.name: Line Leader Daniel
episodes.overview: The children are getting new classroom jobs at school. Daniel really wants to be line leader! When he doesn't get the job he wanted, Daniel is disappointed.

episodes.name: Neighborhood Jobs
episodes.overview: Daniel and Mom Tiger are visiting the library today! Unfortunately, X the Owl isn’t feeling very well, so he can’t do his job. Daniel learns the importance of all the neighborhood jobs and offers to fill in as librarian for the day!

episodes.name: The Tiger Family Grows
episodes.overview: Tiger Family is expanding and Daniel finds out that he is going to be a big brother! At first, he isn’t sure what to expect, but as his family prepares for the arrival of the new baby, Daniel learns about what it means to be a big brother…and a big helper, too.

episodes.name: Daniel Learns about Being a Big Brother
episodes.overview: The new baby is almost here and the Tiger Family is getting ready for the new arrival. Daniel is eager to pitch in as Mom and Dad prepare the baby’s room, but struggles with the idea of giving up his old baby things for his new sibling. He soon realizes that being a big brother means letting go of things you no longer need, and that’s a big help for the whole family.

episodes.name: The Baby Is Here
episodes.overview: The baby is about to arrive and everyone is so excited! Mom and Dad head to the hospital while Daniel and Grandpere spend time at home going through some of Daniel’s old things. In this half-hour musical episode everyone welcomes the new addition to the Neighborhood as Margaret comes home!

episodes.name: Time for Daniel
episodes.overview: Daniel is playing “adventure tiger” at home with Dad, but things are not quite the same, now that Margaret is around. Daniel is upset that Dad keeps having to take care of his little sister, but Daniel learns that there’s time for the baby and time for Daniel, too.

episodes.name: There's Time for Daniel and Baby Too
episodes.overview: Daniel is still getting used to having the new baby around. When Prince Wednesday comes over to play, Daniel gets frustrated because his friend wants to play with the baby instead of him, until he finds that there’s time for the baby and time for Daniel as well. And what’s even better is when they all play together!

episodes.name: Playtime Is Different
episodes.overview: Daniel is having fun playing “restaurant” with O and Katerina, but they keep getting interrupted by a very curious Margaret who wants to be part of the action. She also can’t seem to keep her hands off of Daniel’s beloved Tigey! Daniel eventually learns that although having a new baby sister around is very different…it can also be really fun.

episodes.name: The Playground Is Different with Baby
episodes.overview: Daniel is playing “circus” at the playground with his friends, but Margaret keeps making things different. Mom and Dad encourage Daniel to find a way to include Margaret, and Daniel discovers that playing with her can actually be even more fun! Let the circus parade go on!

episodes.name: Daniel Fixes Trolley
episodes.overview: Daniel accidentally breaks a wheel off Trolley while playing. When Mom is too busy to help Daniel put the wheel back on, she urges him to try to figure it out on his own and explains that fixing it on his own will make him feel good about himself.

episodes.name: Problem Solver Daniel
episodes.overview: Daniel is playing with Miss Elaina and they accidentally break one of the toys. They call Teacher Harriet over to help fix the problem but she tells them to work out a solution without her. They do, and feel proud that they can figure things out all by themselves.

episodes.name: Daniel's Friends Say No
episodes.overview: Daniel approaches Miss Elaina to play but is frustrated when she would rather read alone. Daniel learns that's OK because he can do fun things on his own.

episodes.name: Prince Wednesday Doesn't Want to Play
episodes.overview: At the park, Prince Tuesday and Prince Wednesday are playing together. Daniel wants to join in but is upset when Prince Wednesday only wants to play with his brother.

episodes.name: Daniel's Winter Adventure
episodes.overview: Daniel and Prince Wednesday go sledding with Dad Tiger and Prince Tuesday. When they see how tall the hill is, Daniel and Prince Wednesday get scared. Dad Tiger comforts them by suggesting they try it a little bit at a time. Later on, Daniel tries to ice skate, also a little bit at a time. He feels so happy that he didn't let his fear stop him from doing something that turned out to be so much fun.

episodes.name: Neighborhood Nutcracker
episodes.overview: Daniel is excited to see the Nutcracker Ballet! But when he gets to the show, he finds out that Prince Wednesday is sick and can't perform. The prince asks Daniel to take his place. Daniel is scared at first but soon realizes that if he learns the steps a little at a time, they will be easy to master. The show can go on!

episodes.name: It's Love Day!
episodes.overview: Daniel celebrates Love Day at school with Teacher Harriet and his friends. Everyone gives each other special gifts to say "I love you". Daniel receives a mysterious card, and tries to figure out who gave it to him. The sender shows up to school, and it is Daniel's Grandpere.

episodes.name: Daniel's Love Day Surprise
episodes.overview: Daniel and his family celebrate Love Day with Grandpere at their house. Daniel helps him mom make special Love Day pizza, and sets up a treasure hunt for Grandpere to say "I love you!" But when Margaret finds some of the hidden hearts first, Daniel gets upset with her. Grandpere helps him see that Margaret didn't know and was finding her own way to show Daniel she loves him.

episodes.name: Daniel Explores Nature
episodes.overview: Daniel and his family are spending the day outside exploring, when Daniel spots a beautiful red bird. As they watch the busy bird, they learn about how a bird's nest is built.

episodes.name: Daniel's Nature Walk
episodes.overview: Daniel joins the Owls as they take a nature walk. They see different plants and animals, and even spot a rainbow.

episodes.name: Miss Elaina Gets Hurt
episodes.overview: Daniel and Miss Elaina are having fun playing at Miss Elaina's house. During their playing, they both get hurt, but Daniel doesn't want to admit he's hurt. Lady Elaine comes in and fixes their boo-boos, telling them when they are hurt, they should find a grown up to help make them feel better.

episodes.name: Daniel Feels Better
episodes.overview: Daniel and Margaret are playing "Chase" when Daniel trips over his toy car and hurts his ankle. He is nervous to go see Doctor Anna, but starts feeling better once he learns she is the best person to go to when injured. He learns about X-rays, and learns he sprained his ankle.

episodes.name: Daniel Can't Ride Trolley
episodes.overview: Daniel is going to Prince Wednesday's castle to play, but when Mom tells him that they will be walking and NOT riding Trolley, Daniel gets mad.

episodes.name: Daniel Can't Get What He Wants
episodes.overview: Daniel is shopping with Dad at the Market and gets very upset when Dad says he can't have the cookies he really, really wants.

episodes.name: Nighttime in the Neighborhood
episodes.overview: In this half hour episode, Daniel and his friends are going to a pajama party at the library! As Daniel and his family walk through the moonlit neighborhood, Daniel learns about all of the things that look and sound different at night.

episodes.name: A Storm in the Neighborhood
episodes.overview: There's a big storm coming to the Neighborhood. Daniel and his friends are a little frightened at first, but the grown up's have a plan to keep everyone safe.

episodes.name: After the Neighborhood Storm
episodes.overview: The big storm that came through the Neighborhood has passed. But now everything looks different, with leaves all over, trees knocked down and window shutters fallen.

episodes.name: Margaret's First Chime Time
episodes.overview: The Tiger family takes Margaret to the clock factory for chime time.

episodes.name: Tiger Family Fun
episodes.overview: Daniel and his family head to the Enchanted Garden, only to find Miss Elaina and her family doing one of their special family traditions: pick-your-own-dinner! The Tiger family joins in, and even add a few traditions of their own!

episodes.name: Looking for Snowball
episodes.overview: Snowball, the class pet, has gone missing! As all the neighbors band together to search for Snowball. But will they find Snowball?

episodes.name: Daniel's Neighbors Help
episodes.overview: Achoo! The Tiger Family is under the weather! Lucky for them, their neighbors are at the ready to bring them soup, books and encouragement to help them feel better.

episodes.name: Daniel Makes a Mistake
episodes.overview: While Daniel is looking at different items under the magnifier at school, he accidentally knocks a basket of objects off the table, sending things tumbling all over the floor. Whoops!

episodes.name: Baking Mistakes
episodes.overview: Daniel and Prince Wednesday are at the bakery helping Baker Aker make cookies for the Neighborhood. But Prince Wednesday accidentally spills the milk!

episodes.name: Daniel Thinks of Others
episodes.overview: Daniel is making all kinds of art at school today. While making a picture for his family, he ends up using ALL of the glitter. Oh no!

episodes.name: Daniel Thinks of What Margaret Needs
episodes.overview: Daniel and Miss Elaina want to play their musical instruments and march all around the house, but Margaret needs to sleep and it would be way too noisy!

episodes.name: Daniel Takes Care of Snowball
episodes.overview: It’s Daniels turn to take care of Snowball, the class pet, at home today. When Prince Wednesday invites Daniel to play, he has to decide the best thing to do: take care of Snowball or go and have fun with his friend. Daniel learns that it’s fun to take care of others and it makes him feel happy.

episodes.name: Margaret's Bathtime
episodes.overview: Daniel is at home playing with his toy horse when Mom asks him to help her give Margaret a bath. Reluctant at first, Daniel eventually realizes how proud and good it makes him feel to help take care of his little sister until Dad Tiger gets home.

episodes.name: Friends and Feelings
episodes.overview: Daniel is playing at school with Katerina and Prince Wednesday, but Prince Wednesday won't stop pretending to be a scary bear.

episodes.name: Daniel's Day of Many Feelings
episodes.overview: Daniel is helping Dad with errands around the Neighborhood and Daniel identifies his many feelings as the day unfolds. It's amazing how many different things you can feel in one day!

episodes.name: Daniel and Margaret Visit the Farm
episodes.overview: Daniel heads to the Neighborhood Farm and gets nervous about riding a horse for the first time.

episodes.name: Fireflies and Fireworks
episodes.overview: Margaret gets scared when fireflies show up at the Tiger family picnic.

episodes.name: No Red Sweater for Daniel
episodes.overview: Daniel worries about how he looks when he has to wear a different sweater because his red one is in the wash.

episodes.name: Teacher Harriet's New Hairdo
episodes.overview: Daniel goes to school and finds that something is different: his teacher! But wait…it IS Teacher Harriet, only with a different hairstyle. Daniel is hesitant at first, but soon comes to understand that even though we can all change how we look on the outside, we’re still the same on the inside.

episodes.name: Sharing at the Library
episodes.overview: Daniel is at the library to check out a new book. Just as he spots the book he wants, O the Owl reaches for the same one! Who knew that sharing a book with a friend could be even more fun than reading it alone?

episodes.name: Daniel Shares with Margaret
episodes.overview: Daniel gets a special sticker book from Grandpere, but Margaret wants to play with the stickers, too. Daniel learns that while sharing can make things more fun, there are also some things you don’t have to share.

episodes.name: Daniel's Allergy
episodes.overview: When Daniel tries a peach for the first time, he learns he is allergic to the fruit. Dad and Doctor Anna take care of him, and Doctor Anna tells Daniel how he can take care of himself, too.

episodes.name: Allergies at School
episodes.overview: Daniel is celebrating the 100th day at school. He tells Teacher Harriet and his friends that he is allergic to peaches. Teacher Harriet, Katerina, Miss Elaina, O the Owl and Prince Wednesday take care of Daniel by helping him avoid peaches. They all take care of each other in different ways throughout the school day.

episodes.name: Daniel Makes a Noise Maker
episodes.overview: Daniel and Katerina are playing “super hero helpers.” They use Baby Margaret’s rattle as their super-duper noise maker to make sure everyone knows that help is on the way. When Baby Margaret wants her rattle back, Katerina and Daniel create their own super-duper noise makers and continue saving the day!

episodes.name: Daniel Makes the Neighborhood
episodes.overview: Daniel and Prince Wednesday are at the Museum-Go-Round playing with Miss Elaina. The three friends take their stuffed toys for a trolley ride around a pretend neighborhood and create miniature models of their homes from items they find in the “Make It Box.”

episodes.name: The Neighborhood Fall Festival
episodes.overview: Daniel and friends lend a hand to Music Man Stan after a gust of wind knocks down his Fall Festival decorations.

episodes.name: Field Day at School
episodes.overview: Teacher Harriet has set up a Fall Field Day outside at school today. While trying new games, Daniel and his friends struggle to play the games the way they want to.

episodes.name: Daniel and O's Road Trip
episodes.overview: Daniel and O pretend to go on a Trolley road trip, but they can't agree on where to travel to first.

episodes.name: Daniel's Puppet Plan
episodes.overview: When Daniel and his friends are making puppets at the library, they find out that making a plan can help them put on a grr-ific puppet show!

episodes.name: Daniel and Margaret Play School
episodes.overview: Teacher Daniel is playing "school" today, but his "student," Baby Margaret, just won't cooperate!

episodes.name: Treasure Hunt at the Castle
episodes.overview: Daniel, Prince Wednesday and Chrissie can't decide what to play at the Castle.

episodes.name: Daniel's Happy Song
episodes.overview: Daniel is so happy because his friends are coming over to play! As they play with their stuffies, Daniel teaches his friends his happy song and they all sing along!

episodes.name: Prince Wednesday's Happy Birthday
episodes.overview: Happy Birthday, Prince Wednesday! Daniel heads to the castle for Prince Wednesday's birthday party and feels happy to be with his friends, play games, and eat royally yummy birthday cake.

episodes.name: The Lemonade Stand
episodes.overview: Daniel and Prince Wednesday are making a lemonade stand together. But when they don't agree about how to hand out the lemonade, they need to learn to express their mad feelings so they can find a solution and provide lemonade for their neighbors.

episodes.name: Mad at the Beach
episodes.overview: Daniel is at the beach with Miss Elaina and they're building a sandcastle. Suddenly, the creation they worked so hard to make gets knocked down by a wave, and that makes them mad, mad, MAD! Dad teaches the kids that it helps to express your mad feelings.

episodes.name: Daniel Feels Two Feelings
episodes.overview: Up, up and away! Daniel, Katerina, and O are excited to fly a kite, but get frustrated when they can't keep the kite in the air. They find out that it's ok to feel two feelings at the same time.

episodes.name: The Neighborhood Carnival
episodes.overview: The Neighborhood Carnival is in town and Daniel can't stop thinking about riding the Ferris wheel for the very first time. But when he gets to the carnival, he feels both excited and scared. Will Daniel ride the Ferris wheel or wait until next year?

episodes.name: Tiger Family Trip
episodes.overview: The Tiger Family is heading out on a road trip to Grandpere's house! At first, Daniel doesn't know what to expect on the ride, but when Mom Tiger gives him a helpful map, he learns that there are so many exciting things to do and see when you're on a trip with your family.

episodes.name: Visiting Grandpere
episodes.overview: The Tiger Family is visiting Grandpere's house and Daniel notices all of the things that are different and all of the things that are the same. Then, Grandpere and Daniel spend time together hunting for buried treasure.

episodes.name: The Tiger Family Goes Back Home
episodes.overview: It's Daniel's last day visiting Grandpere! Grandpere takes him on a special sunrise boat ride before the Tiger Family heads back to the Neighborhood of Make-Believe.

episodes.name: Daniel's Bicycle
episodes.overview: Dad Tiger gives Daniel his old bicycle and Daniel is eager to ride it. Daniel quickly realizes that riding his bike is not easy, but even with a few bumps in the road, he keeps on trying.

episodes.name: Katerina's Magic Trick
episodes.overview: Katerina is learning how to do a magic trick, but is frustrated when she doesn't get it right. She soon realizes that if she keeps trying, she'll feel proud!

episodes.name: Daniel Goes to Sleep
episodes.overview: It's time for Daniel to go to sleep, but there's just one problem, he's not feeling sleepy! Daniel learns how to get calm and relax his body for bed.

episodes.name: Prince Wednesday Sleeps Over
episodes.overview: Prince Wednesday is coming over for a grr-ific sleepover. But when the boys just want to stay up and play, their babysitter, Prince Tuesday, helps them wind down for bed.

episodes.name: Daniel Takes His Time
episodes.overview: Grandpere is visiting Daniel and they are baking raisin bread together. Daniel learns that sometimes it's good to take your time and it can be worth the wait.

episodes.name: Sometimes It's Good to Go Slow
episodes.overview: Daniel's class is going on a nature walk. The group learns that sometimes it's good to go slow: seeing, hearing, and smelling the environment around you. You never know what you'll find!

episodes.name: King Daniel for the Day
episodes.overview: Daniel Tiger is curious about what it's like to be King. There's only one way to find out? King Friday makes Daniel 'King for the Day'! On his royal mission, Daniel discovers that the most important part of being King is being kind to his neighbors.

episodes.name: Firefighters at School
episodes.overview: The volunteer firefighters of the Neighborhood of Make-Believe make a special visit to school. Daniel and his friends discover that a person can be many different things - a doctor and a firefighter - even at the same time!

episodes.name: Daniel's Doll
episodes.overview: Daniel receives a new doll from his Grandpere and he can't wait to pretend to be the daddy. When Katerina and O insist that Daniel pretends to be Tigey the Adventure Tiger instead, Daniel reminds them that you can be more than one thing.

episodes.name: Daniel's Very Different Day
episodes.overview: Daniel was expecting to have a special picnic at Katerina's house, but the day doesn't turn out quite as he had planned. Daniel learns how to adapt when his routine changes.

episodes.name: Class Trip to the Library
episodes.overview: Daniel and his friends are excited to go on a field trip to the library, but they arrive to find that it's closed. Together, they learn that sometimes plans may change, but they can do things in a different way!

episodes.name: Daniel Loves Tigey
episodes.overview: Daniel gets upset when Margaret spills juice on his favorite stuffed animal, Tigey. Daniel learns how he can make himself feel better when he's upset.

episodes.name: Daniel Needs Tigey at School
episodes.overview: Daniel is having a hard day at school, but he knows just how to make himself feel better: by hugging Tigey!

episodes.name: Daniel's Goldfish Dies
episodes.overview: When Daniel's pet fish dies, he begins to ask questions about what happened to help him understand what death means and how to handle the emotions that often come with losing someone you love.

episodes.name: Daniel's Strawberry Seeds
episodes.overview: Daniel and Katerina go to the Enchanted Garden to pick strawberries, only to find that the strawberry plants are dead. They ask questions to help them understand what's happened and learn what it means when something dies.

episodes.name: Daniel Wants to Be Alone
episodes.overview: While playing with his friends at school, Daniel decides he would like to spend some time alone.

episodes.name: Daniel's Alone Space
episodes.overview: When Daniel receives a new "Tigey the Adventure Tiger" book from Grandpere in the mail, he sits down to read it, but keeps getting distracted by Margaret. Daniel learns that when he wants to be alone, he can find a place of his very own.

episodes.name: Daniel Gets Mad at Dad
episodes.overview: On their way to the Post Office, Dad tells Daniel he cannot play at the playground and he gets angry.

episodes.name: Daniel Gets Mad at His Friends
episodes.overview: Miss Elaina and Daniel damage Daniel's project, and he gets mad.

episodes.name: Daniel Doesn't Want to Go Potty
episodes.overview: Daniel and Mom Tiger are meeting Katerina for lunch, and Daniel learns that it's important to try to go , potty before leaving the house.

episodes.name: Daniel Sits on the Potty
episodes.overview: Daniel is playing astronauts with Miss Elaina, but his tummy starts to hurt. He learns that sometimes when your tummy hurts, it could mean that you have to go potty.

episodes.name: Circle Time Squabble
episodes.overview: At school, Daniel gets so mad at Miss Elaina that he wants to push her. Instead, he remembers the importance of self-control and how to stop himself from hurting a friend.

episodes.name: It's Not Okay to Hurt Someone
episodes.overview: Farmer Daniel gets mad when Margaret knocks down his fence. Daniel learns that it's okay to be angry, but it's never okay to hurt someone.

episodes.name: Daniel Learns About Lizards
episodes.overview: Daniel and Prince Wednesday discover a small lizard in Daniel's backyard. They have a lot of questions about the lizard. When they wonder and explore, they learn so many new things.

episodes.name: Daniel Wonders About Trolley
episodes.overview: Daniel and his friends learn more about their favorite Neighborhood Trolley!

episodes.name: Daniel Finds Something to Do
episodes.overview: Daniel learns he can have fun on his own, with creativity and imagination.

episodes.name: Daniel's Royal Good Time
episodes.overview: Jodi is nervous about a new school

episodes.name: Daniel's Lunch
episodes.overview: Daniel is upset when Miss Elaina declares she doesn't like egg salad.

episodes.name: Daniel's Toy
episodes.overview: Jodi hangs out with Prince upsets Daniel

episodes.name: Jodi's First Day at School
episodes.overview: Jodi is nervous about her first day at a new school.

episodes.name: Daniel Plays at Jodi's House
episodes.overview: Daniel is nervous playing at Jodi's house until he finds blueberries, which make him feel better.

episodes.name: A New Friend at School
episodes.overview: Daniel's new friend Jodi is busy playing with Prince Wednesday, leaving Daniel to wonder if they're still friends.

episodes.name: A New Friend at the Playground
episodes.overview: Miss Elaina likes Jodi more than Daniel.

episodes.name: Daniel Visits the Dentist
episodes.overview: Daniel visits his new neighbor and dentist, Dr. Plat, for the first time.

episodes.name: Daniel's First Haircut
episodes.overview: Daniel gets his first haircut.

episodes.name: Daniel's Obstacle Course
episodes.overview: Daniel and his sister Margaret play on an obstacle course.

episodes.name: Daniel Plays in a Gentle Way
episodes.overview: Daniel is playing slowly outside at school, but his friends start to play too fast and rough with him.

episodes.name: Daniel Learns to Ask First
episodes.overview: Daniel takes a spoon away from Margaret, which makes her cry. He just wanted a drumstick.

episodes.name: Friends Ask First
episodes.overview: Teacher Harriet explains that you should ask first before taking something away from someone.

episodes.name: Jodi's Mama Travels for Work
episodes.overview: Jodi is sad that Dr. Platypus is going away for 3 days.

episodes.name: The Tiger Family Babysits
episodes.overview: Teddy and Leo are sad that Nana is at the market.

episodes.name: Daniel Does Gymnastics
episodes.overview: When Daniel goes to gymnastics for the first time, he feels a little nervous to join in with his friends. Dad Tiger helps Daniel feel brave by doing the gymnastics movements together and showing him that he can do it all on his own.

episodes.name: The Big Slide
episodes.overview: O is scared of the big slide for the first time.

episodes.name: Daniel's Blueberry Paws
episodes.overview: Daniel Tiger's treat from Prince Tuesday's fruity ice treat cart starts to melt when he becomes distracted by all the other flavors.

episodes.name: Wow at the Library
episodes.overview: Daniel and O the Owl are enjoying a pop-up story at the library with Uncle X when O flutters off to find more books to read. X teaches O to enjoy the book they’re already reading.

episodes.name: Margaret's Birthday Buddy
episodes.overview: Daniel struggles when the attention is not on him at Margaret's party until he figures out that he can be a “tigertastic” birthday buddy and help make Margaret's day special.

episodes.name: Margaret's Birthday Party
episodes.overview: Margaret’s birthday party is underway, and Daniel is feeling left out. He remembers he can be a “grr-ific” birthday buddy, so he leads Margaret and friends in a silly panda game.

episodes.name: Find What Makes Your Family Special
episodes.overview: Katerina wishes she had a little sister like Baby Margaret to play with. She learns that even though she doesn't have a baby sister, there are other wonderful things that make her family special.

episodes.name: Family Day
episodes.overview: It's Family Day at the Neighborhood Library! Daniel learns that each family is different and special in its own way, and the Tiger Family performs a special song.

episodes.name: Daniel Likes to Be with Dad
episodes.overview: Daniel and Dad Tiger spend the whole day together searching for seashells, picking apples, and even a special surprise. But when things don't go as planned, Dad and Daniel remember that it doesn't matter what they do, they just enjoy being together.

episodes.name: Daniel Likes to Be with Mom
episodes.overview: Daniel is thrilled to spend the day with Mom - they even turn Mom's old wagon into a trolley together! Although the wagon doesn't turn out perfectly, it doesn't matter because they're just happy to be with one another.

episodes.name: The Family Campout
episodes.overview: Daniel and Dad Tiger head to the "Dad and Me" Camp-out, joined by his friends and their dads. When Katerina arrives with her mom, she notices that she's the only one who brought her mom. Henrietta assures Katerina that all families are different, and that's okay.

episodes.name: A Game Night for Everyone
episodes.overview: Daniel and Mom are on their way to "Mom and Me" Game Night when they run into O and X the Owl. O isn't sure if he can go to Game Night without a mom, but Uncle X assures him that he has his uncle, who loves him very much, to bring him.

episodes.name: Daniel's Grr-Ific Grandpere
episodes.overview: Daniel Tiger is excited to spend the whole day with his grandpa - Grandpere! Whether they're riding on Grandpere's boat, sorting through Grandpere's treasures, or even just relaxing on the sandy shore, they love the special time they have together.

episodes.name: Making Mozies with Nana
episodes.overview: Daniel Tiger spends the whole day with Jodi and her Nana. Jodi and Nana love the special things they do together, like baking sweet treats and coloring.

episodes.name: Daniel's Tiger Twirl
episodes.overview: At the Neighborhood Carnival, Miss Elaina shows off her cartwheel trick, but when Daniel tries, he can't do a cartwheel like the one Miss Elaina did. Dad Tiger teaches Daniel that he can do a trick his own way, the Daniel way!

episodes.name: You Can Play Your Own Way
episodes.overview: Daniel is playing school with Miss Elaina and Jodi, but Miss Elaina gets upset when Jodi keeps copying everything she does. The friends help Jodi realize that she has great ideas of her own, and that she should play her own way.

episodes.name: Calm at the Restaurant
episodes.overview: The Tiger Family goes to the restaurant for taco night with Jodi and Dr. Plat. Daniel and Jodi find out that there are times to be silly and times to be calm.

episodes.name: Calm in Class
episodes.overview: Music Man Stan comes to school for a special musical story with the class. Daniel, Katerina, and Miss Elaina learn to be calm so that everyone can enjoy the story.

episodes.name: Mad at the Crayon Factory
episodes.overview: Daniel returns to the Crayon Factory with O the Owl and Jodi. When Daniel gets mad that he doesn't get a crayon box right away, he takes a deep breath and realizes there are plenty of boxes for everyone.

episodes.name: Mad at School
episodes.overview: Daniel and O are building a cardboard car contraption at school, but when it breaks, they get mad. Once they take a deep breath and count to four, they're able to fix their contraption together.

episodes.name: Daniel's Substitute Teacher
episodes.overview: Daniel is excited for the Spring Sing, but is hesitant to find he has a substitute teacher.

episodes.name: Prince Wednesday's Accident
episodes.overview: Prince Wednesday spills paint all over his pants and the floor but feels better after telling Teacher Harriet what happened.

episodes.name: Daniel and Miss Elaina's Kite Accident
episodes.overview: Daniel is playing at Miss Elaina's house when they accidentally break her dad's old kite. They feel bad, but when they tell Music Man Stan what happened, he explains that accidents happen to everyone, even adults.

episodes.name: Quiet Time at School
episodes.overview: It's Quiet Time at school, but Daniel and Miss Elaina don't want to stop playing with their trains. Teacher Harriet shows the kids the different ways they can settle down, like stretching, reading a book, or closing your eyes.

episodes.name: Naptime in Blanket City
episodes.overview: Daniel and Jodi make a pretend city out of all of the blankets in the Platypus house. When it's nap time for Teddy and Leo, Jodi finds Leo's missing blankie for him to snuggle-that's what he needs to help him rest.

episodes.name: The Fire Drill
episodes.overview: At school, Teacher Harriet shows the class what to do to stay safe during a fire drill. While Daniel and his friends are playing, the fire alarm starts to ring, and the class practices their fire drill, following Teacher Harriet's instructions. The Neighborhood firefighters arrive to check on their classroom and teach the kids all about staying safe during an emergency.

episodes.name: Daniel and Mom Go to the Market
episodes.overview: Daniel and Mom Tiger are making a yummy breakfast at home when a mug falls and shatters. Daniel is about to help pick up the pieces, but his mom tells him to stop and listen to stay safe while she cleans up. When they go to the market afterwards, Daniel gets lost in one of the aisles. With the help of Prince Tuesday, he stops and listens, and Mom Tiger is able to find him.

episodes.name: Daniel Waits With Dad
episodes.overview: Daniel is excited about going to the library to get a new book, but first has to wait with Dad.

episodes.name: Margaret's New Shoes
episodes.overview: Daniel can't wait to go to the playground, but first he has to go to the store to get new shoes for Margaret.

episodes.name: Daniel's New Friend Max
episodes.overview: Daniel meets a new friend, Max, who is autistic.

episodes.name: A New Friend at the Clock Factory
episodes.overview: Daniel and his friends help make Max more comfortable at Chime Time.

episodes.name: Jodi's Asthma
episodes.overview: Jodi's asthma makes it hard for her to run around with her friends during a game of Splat Ball.

episodes.name: Daniel and Max Play at the Playground
episodes.overview: Daniel feels left out when there's no room for him to play at the xylophone.

episodes.name: Daniel's Rocking Chair
episodes.overview: Teddy and Leo lose their toy cars. Since Daniel doesn't use his anymore, he gives them to the twins to enjoy. When he sees how happy they make them, Daniel decides to give Margaret his old rocking chair too.

episodes.name: Prince Wednesday Gives Away His Book
episodes.overview: The Royal Family donates used books to the library so Daniel and the other neighbors can enjoy them as well. Later, Daniel chooses to give away his special binoculars to Prince Wednesday.

episodes.name: Daniel Does It Himself
episodes.overview: Daniel wants to go play in the snow, but Dad Tiger says he must wait until it is time to get up.

episodes.name: Daniel Learns to Swing
episodes.overview: Daniel wants to swing as high as Jodi at the playground.

episodes.name: Margaret's First Thank You Day
episodes.overview: Daniel can’t wait to show Margaret all of the things they can do to celebrate Thank You Day at the Enchanted Garden! However, when Margaret gets sick and has to leave early, Daniel decides to bring Thank You Day back to Margaret instead.

episodes.name: Daniel Goes to the Hospital
episodes.overview: When Daniel is feeling a little nervous for his first trip to the hospital, Mom and Dad Tiger prepare him for his new experience. After he arrives, Daniel meets a doctor and nurse who put him at ease and help him get better.

episodes.name: Prince Tuesday Goes to College
episodes.overview: Prince Tuesday is packing because he’s moving away to college. Daniel and Prince Wednesday will miss playing with him every day!

episodes.name: Daniel Misses Grandpere
episodes.overview: Grandpere gives Daniel a photo to look at when they’re apart.

episodes.name: Tiger Family Lunch
episodes.overview: When joining Mom Tiger for a picnic, Daniel gets distracted playing instead of sitting down for lunch.

episodes.name: Dinnertime at Jodi's
episodes.overview: Daniel helps make pan pans for dinner at the Platypus house. When Jodi is distracted by her toy, she almost misses out on the fun!

episodes.name: Daniel and Miss Elaina Bake Pretzels
episodes.overview: Daniel and Miss Elaina bake pretzels together at the bakery!

episodes.name: O Gives Daniel Space
episodes.overview: O sits too close to Daniel while the friends are playing library at O’s treehouse. X the Owl tells Daniel it is okay to ask for space!

episodes.name: The Neighborhood Snowstorm
episodes.overview: Daniel and his friends have to leave school early because there's a big snowstorm headed their way. Daniel is feeling frightened, but the grown-ups in his life are there to keep him safe. Later, when a pipe bursts at the Tiger House, Daniel knows there are grown-ups and neighbors to take care of him.

episodes.name: Daniel Listens to Dad
episodes.overview: Daniel is playing with his fishies and doesn't listen when Dad Tiger tells him it's time to go to The Music Shop. Dad shows Daniel how to stop and show he's listening, so they can make it to the Music Shop before it closes.

episodes.name: Daniel and Katerina Listen to Each Other
episodes.overview: Daniel is playing at Katerina's house and wants to put on a show, but Katerina isn't listening and keeps playing her own way. When Henrietta shows them that they can stop and listen to each other, they come up with a grr-ific new way to play together.

episodes.name: Margaret Gets All the Attention
episodes.overview: When Daniel wants to play a game with Mom Tiger outside, he's upset that she is giving Margaret all of her attention. He learns that there's time for both Margaret and Daniel.

episodes.name: Prince Tuesday Visits
episodes.overview: Daniel is very excited, because Prince Tuesday is home visiting from college. But, Prince Wednesday is upset that Daniel is paying more attention to his big brother than to him. King Friday reminds Prince Wednesday that there's time for both him and his brother.

episodes.name: Jodi's Lemonade Stand
episodes.overview: Daniel and his friends set up a lemonade stand.

episodes.name: Daniel Remembers What He Needs
episodes.overview: Daniel repeats his checklist out loud so he remembers everything he needs for school.

episodes.name: Daniel Follows the Rules at the Pool
episodes.overview: After Daniel runs and slips at the neighborhood pool, he remembers the rules so he can stay safe.

episodes.name: Daniel's First Swim Class
episodes.overview: Daniel is afraid to put his face in the water at his first swim class.

episodes.name: Disappointed at the Pool
episodes.overview: Daniel is disappointed that he is not allowed to use his new toy float in the neighborhood pool.

episodes.name: Disappointed at the Farm
episodes.overview: Daniel and Miss Elaina visit Ducky at the farm.

episodes.name: Daniel Visits a New Neighborhood
episodes.overview: Daniel takes his first train ride to visit Juan Carlos and his family in another neighborhood, but when he arrives, he is disappointed to find that the gift he brought for Juan Carlos is broken.

episodes.name: Daniel's New Babysitter
episodes.overview: Daniel is unsure about his new babysitter, but he gives it some time and has a tigertastic day.

episodes.name: Daniel Sleeps at the Treehouse
episodes.overview: Daniel and O the Owl sleep over at Katerina’s. O feels uncomfortable at first, but gives it some time and decides to stay.

episodes.name: Daniel Feels Worried About Mom
episodes.overview: Daniel feels worried when Mom Tiger hurts her arm, but talking about it helps him feel better.

episodes.name: Jodi Loses Benji
episodes.overview: Jodi loses her stuffie, Benji the Hedgehog, and is worried her mom won't find him. Talking about it with her friends helps her feel better.

episodes.name: Jodi Tries Ballet
episodes.overview: Jodi gets frustrated when she can’t do a ballet dance, but she sticks with it even though it is hard.

episodes.name: Daniel Tries Something New With Grandpere
episodes.overview: Daniel struggles to make a snack all by himself, but he keeps trying and gets better at it!

episodes.name: Daniel Goes to Day Camp
episodes.overview: Daniel is excited for his first day at day camp! He and his friends go on a nature walk full of surprises.

episodes.name: Daniel's Rainy Day at Camp
episodes.overview: Camp Counselor Amira shows Daniel and his friends how to make colorful tie-dye shirts.

episodes.name: Daniel Gives a Gift
episodes.overview: On her birthday, Miss Elaina learns it’s important to take time to appreciate gifts from friends.

episodes.name: Daniel Receives a Gift
episodes.overview: Then, when Daniel receives a gift from Grandpere, he wants more. Daniel realizes he must stop to appreciate the things he has.

episodes.name: Miss Elaina's Bandage
episodes.overview: With help from her mom and Dr. Anna, Miss Elaina makes bandages that look like her skin color.

episodes.name: A Fair Place to Play
episodes.overview: With help from the grown-ups, Chrissie and her friends build a ramp so that Chrissie can climb to the top of the slide, too!

episodes.name: Mr. Malik Comes Back to School
episodes.overview: When the class is feeling excited, Mr. Malik helps them calm down and get ready to meet his pet hermit crab

episodes.name: Daniel's Wintertime Walk
episodes.overview: Daniel and Katerina don't want to stop playing in the snow, but Henrietta helps them stop when it's time to do something else.

episodes.name: The Neighborhood Wedding
episodes.overview: Dr. Anna and Baker Aker are getting married, and the whole Neighborhood is helping them celebrate! Daniel has an important job as the ring bearer and learns there are many ways to say “I love you.”

episodes.name: Daniel and Miss Elaina's Obstacle Course
episodes.overview: When Miss Elaina’s dad is busy, she and Daniel play in her obstacle course on their own.

episodes.name: Daniel and O's Magic Show
episodes.overview: Daniel and O want to put on a magic show for Mom and X the Owl, but they’re busy. Daniel and O perform for a puppet audience instead!

episodes.name: Grandpere Sleeps Over
episodes.overview: When Grandpere sleeps over at Daniel’s house, Daniel thinks about what Grandpere needs to be comfortable.

episodes.name: Tea Party at the Castle
episodes.overview: Daniel’s friends are having a stuffie tea party. When Daniel doesn’t have a stuffie, Prince Wednesday helps him find one.

episodes.name: Daniel Helps Take Care of Margaret
episodes.overview: Daniel is upset when Dad Tiger can’t pick him up from school, but Nana Platypus helps take care of him.

episodes.name: Daniel Goes to the Dinosaur Playground
episodes.overview: On a class trip, Daniel wants to stay with his mom, but she reminds him that Teacher Harriet is also there to take care of him.

episodes.name: Daniel's Important Job at the Market
episodes.overview: Daniel and Dad help Prince Tuesday at the market.

episodes.name: Daniel's Important Job at the Enchanted Garden
episodes.overview: Daniel is excited to plant flowers, but is upset when he gets the job of weeding. He learns that everyone’s job is important!

episodes.name: Everyone Has a Turn at Show and Tell
episodes.overview: Daniel and his classmates learn how to take turns during Show and Tell.

episodes.name: Daniel Takes Turns at the Pool
episodes.overview: At the Neighborhood pool, Daniel and Miss Elaina take turns playing with the bubble wand. Later, he and Prince Wednesday take turns using a pool noodle.

episodes.name: Daniel and Max Ask to Play
episodes.overview: Daniel and Max see their friends playing, but don't know how to join in.

episodes.name: Daniel Asks to Play at the Music Shop
episodes.overview: O the Owl is worried about joining his friends, but when he asks if he can play too, they say yes!

episodes.name: Juan Carlos Visits the Neighborhood
episodes.overview: Daniel has lots of activities he wants to do with Juan Carlos, but Mom reminds him to ask what his guest wants to do.

episodes.name: Daniel Shows Juan Carlos the Clock Factory
episodes.overview: Daniel can't wait to show Juan Carlos the Clock Factory, but he remembers to ask Juan Carlos first.

episodes.name: Daniel and Miss Elaina Put Their Things Away
episodes.overview: When Miss Elaina loses her mitten, her mom teaches her how to put her things away so she can find them again.

episodes.name: Daniel and Prince Wednesday Put Their Things Away
episodes.overview: After Prince Wednesday leaves his comic book outside, he and Daniel learn to put things away where they belong.

episodes.name: Pizza Day at School
episodes.overview: Daniel thinks Prince Wednesday wants peppers on his pizza, but learns that friends can like different things.

episodes.name: Daniel and Jodi Like Different Things
episodes.overview: At the beach, Daniel gets upset when Jodi sprays him with a water toy. She learns to ask how others like to play.

episodes.name: Daniel's Surprising Day
episodes.overview: When Daniel goes on a walk with his family on an ordinary day, they find all kinds of surprises along the way!

episodes.name: Daniel Makes a Surprise
episodes.overview: After surprising Jodi with a heart-shaped rock, Daniel and his Dad surprise other neighbors with colorful rock drawings.

episodes.name: Something New About Trolley
episodes.overview: There's something new about Trolley, and Daniel is so excited to find out what it is! As he waits, he learns new things about his friends. In the end, Daniel discovers that Trolley can turn into a boat. Daniel and his friends enjoy a ride!

episodes.name: Daniel Asks What Friends Like
episodes.overview: Teacher Harriet helps Daniel make a chart to ask his friends how they like to say hello.

episodes.name: Miss Elaina's Space Restaurant
episodes.overview: When Miss Elaina and Katerina play together, they ask each other how they like to play. Sometimes they like different things!

episodes.name: Daniel Doesn't Want to Miss Out
episodes.overview: Daniel has to go potty, but is worried there won't be space for his sea turtle on the class mural when he's done in the bathroom.

episodes.name: Cousins at the Castle
episodes.overview: Prince Wednesday needs to get dressed before he can go outside to see the butterflies and play with Chrissie.

episodes.name: Daniel and O Make Deliveries
episodes.overview: When Daniel and O are playing post office, their wagon breaks. They look around and find something else to use.

episodes.name: Jodi Makes a Boat with Max
episodes.overview: Jodi and Nana see Teacher Harriet and Max playing with a homemade boat. Jodi uses things she finds in nature to make one, too.
